subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Katie Smith scored 22 points, 1 shy of her career playoff high, to help the defending champion Shock beat the cold-shooting Phoenix Mercury and take a 2-1 lead in the W.N.B.A. finals.
snippet: Katie Smith scored 22 points, 1 shy of her career playoff high, to help the defending champion Shock beat the cold-shooting Phoenix Mercury and take a 2-1 lead in the W.N.B.A. finals.
